lead_paragraph: Quarterback Jeremiah Masoli, who was dismissed from the team at Oregon after pleading guilty to burglary and then being cited for marijuana possession, has found a home at Mississippi.
snippet: Quarterback Jeremiah Masoli, who was dismissed from the team at Oregon after pleading guilty to burglary and then being cited for marijuana possession, has found a home at Mississippi.

headline.main: Masoli to Play for Ole Miss
headline.print_headline: Masoli To Play For Ole Miss
